Title: toIPv4OrDefault(string)
Description: Same as toIPv4, but if the IPv4 address has an invalid format, it returns 0.0.0.0 (0 IPv4).
value — A string-encoded IPv4 address. String
value converted to an IPv4 address. IPv4.
Examples: SELECT  toIPv4OrDefault('192.168.0.1') AS s1,  toIPv4OrDefault('192.168.0') AS s2
